title._content: [Portrait of Joe Marsala and Tommy Potter, Turkish Embassy, Washington, D.C., 193-] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Joe Marsala and Tommy Potter, Turkish Embassy, Washington, D.C., 193-] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 033 Reference print available in Music Division, Library of Congress. Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). In: The Washington Post, no. 24,013 (Mar. 15, 1942), p. VI, 6. Subjects: Marsala, Joe, 1907-1978 Potter, Tommy, 1918- Jazz musicians--1930-1940. Double bassists--1930-1940. Clarinetists--1930-1940. Turkish Embassy Format: Portrait photographs--1930-1940. Group portraits--1930-1940. Film negatives--1930-1940. Rights Info: Mr. Gottlieb has dedicated these works to the public domain, but rights of privacy and publicity may apply. lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/html/gottlieb/gottlieb-copyrig...
